q:
In SAP FICO, you try to post intercompany posting, but the company code pair has not been set up for cross-company code posting. You have received the following error. Now, which of the following actions can be a solution for this scenario:

Error message

No clearing accounts specified for company codes NNNN/MMMM

Actions

  1. Make a configuration change in OBYA. Company Codes must be on the different Withholding Tax settings
  2. Make a configuration change in OBOA. Company Codes must be on the same Withholding Tax setting (Classic or Extended)
  3. Make a configuration change in OBYA. Company Codes must be on the same Withholding Tax setting (Classic or Extended)

In SAP FICO, you try to post an Invoice and the tax code has not been maintained in Configuration. You have received the following error. Now, which of the following actions can be a solution for this scenario:

Error message

Transaction key XXX YY Chart of Accounts ZZZZ not defined in table T030K

Actions

  1. Go to Tcode OB42, remove Chart of Account (ZZZZ), Transaction (XXX), and unassign G/L to the tax code (YY)
  2. Go to Tcode OB40, Provide Chart of Account (ZZZZ), Transaction (XXX), and assign G/L to the tax code (YY)
  3. Go to Tcode OB40, remove Chart of Account (ZZZZ), Transaction (XXX), and reassign G/L to the tax code (YY)

In SAP FICO, you are working on the Cutover strategy to migrate the data from the legacy system to the SAP system. If you are required to perform this action, which of the following can be implemented in this scenario:

  1. Batch Data Communication (BDC)
  2. Account Migration Service (AMS)
  3. Legacy System Migration Workbench (LSMW))

SAP FICO Tables are used to store the data when you enter some data in a screen. If you are working on Cost Center Accounting tables, then which of the following statements about these tables in this scenario are correct:

Statements

  1. Table CSKS represents the Cost center master data
  2. Table CRCO represents the Cost center texts
  3. Table COBK represents the document header
  4. Table COSP represents the Cost totals for external postings

SAP FICO Tables are used to store the data when you enter some data in a screen. If you are working on SAP FI G/L Tables, then which of the following tables represent the SAP Accounting Document header?

SAP FICO Tables are used to store the data when you enter some data in a screen. Which of the following statements about the tables from Enterprise Structure are correct:

Statements

  1. Table TCURR represents the SAP currency-codes
  2. Table T009 represents the SAP Fiscal year variants
  3. Table T004 represents the SAP Chart of Accounts (COA)
  4. Table T001B represents the SAP Permitted posting periods

In SAP FICO, you are working on G/LAccount postings. If you are required to work on the entry of G/L account documents for ledger groups, then which of the following conditions should be applied in this scenario:

Conditions

  1. You can make postings to accounts that are managed on an open item basis.
  2. You can make tax-relevant postings.
  3. You can post to tax accounts directly.

In SAP FICO, General ledger (G/L) accounts are master data that is used in day-to-day transaction processing in various modules of the SAP ERP system. While creating a G/L account centrally, if you are in the Control Data tab, then which of the following checkboxes should be checked to allow GL account to post transactions if there are no tax parameters in transaction postings?

In SAP, Alice is working on a Subsidiary Ledger account named Accounts Payable to record and manage accounting data for all the vendors. If she is required to work on the steps for the configuration of this account, then determine the first step that she needs to perform in this scenario?

a.option: Create number range for vendors account

q:
In SAP, Anita is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. If she is required to define the document types after defining the posting keys, then which of the following sequences of steps must she follow to perform this action in this scenario:

Steps

  1. Financial Accounting
  2. Financial Accounting Global settings
  3. Documents
  4. Define Document types
  5. Documents header
  6. SPRO
  7. IMG

In SAP, Mike is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. Initially, he has defined a Fiscal year. If he is required to assign Company Code to Fiscal Year Variant, then determine its transaction code?

In SAP, Tara is working on Financial Accounting Global settings configuration. Initially, she has defined a Fiscal year and assigned the Company Code to the Fiscal Year Variant. Now, she has defined the variant for both the open and close posting period. Which of the following actions must she perform in this scenario before she defines the Field status variant?

a.option: Assign Company code to Field Status Variants

q:
John is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial Accounting. If he is required to define Functional Area in SAP, then which of the following statements about this Functional Area are correct:

Statements

  1. This area is used to create a P&L A/C in Financial Accounting by using the cost of sales accounting.
  2. John can classify the expenses by implementing these functional areas.
  3. These functional areas can be created in SAP using T-code OKBD only.

Ben is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial  Accounting. He has defined the Functional area. Now, if he is required to define Credit Control Area, then determine the transaction code for this Credit Control Area in this scenario?

Alice is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial Accounting. Now, if she is assigning the company code to company in this scenario, then determine its transaction code?

In SAP FICO, you are working on Automatic posting. While this is happening, you will not be able to assign the Cost objects manually. Now, which of the following actions is required to perform to resolve this issue in this scenario?

a.option: The system is going to need a Cost Object in the posting as a posting needs to be automatically done in SAP Controlling.
You will need to assign a default cost object to the account (OKB9).
If multiple lines need to be inserted, then multiple tax types must be created.

q: In SAP FICO, you are working on reports. If you are required to display General Ledger (G/L) account master data that is not specific to the company code and print out G/L account lists, then which of the following reports can be used to perform this action in this scenario?

In SAP FICO, Tcodes are used to access functions or execute ABAP programs in SAP applications for fast processing and executions. If you are required to post one vendor invoice only from an accounting point of view, then which of the following Tcodes can be implemented here to perform this action in this scenario?

In SAP FICO, Tcodes are used to access functions or execute ABAP programs in SAP applications for fast processing and executions. After posting any transaction, the system will generate an accounting document. If you are required to view that accounting document, then which of the following Tcode can be used to perform this action in this scenario?

In SAP FICO, Tcodes are used to access functions or execute ABAP programs in SAP applications for fast processing and executions. If you are required to process the dunning program such as Sales organization etc., then which of the following Tcode can be used to justify this purpose in this scenario?

In SAP FICO, Tcodes are used to access functions or execute ABAP programs in SAP applications for fast processing and executions. If you are required to classify the fixed assets in asset accounting according to the asset types, then determine its Tcode in this scenario?

Mike is working on a Document number assignment from G/L Account Postings in SAP FICO. He has performed postings from valuations to ledger groups to which more than one ledger is assigned to guarantee the contiguous assignment of document numbers in non-leading ledgers as well. But his manager Ben has told Mike that this is not a recommended approach to guarantee the contiguous assignment. Now, which of the following actions is recommended in this scenario?

a.option: Mike should always perform postings from valuations to grouped ledgers.
Mike should always perform postings from valuations to individual ledgers.
Mike should always perform postings from valuations to non-grouped ledgers.

q: In SAP FICO, if you are working on the G/L Account Postings, then which of the following functions is used to post to all ledgers in your General Ledger Accounting?

a.option: Enter G/L Account Document for Ledger Group
Enter G/L Account Document for Postings

q:
In SAP FICO, General ledger (G/L) accounts are master data that is used in day-to-day transaction processing in various modules of the SAP ERP system. While creating a  G/L account centrally, if you are in the Type/Description tab, then which of the following types of accounts can be selected in Control in the chart of accounts panel which would determine the type of G/L account to be created:

Accounts

  1. G/L balance report account
  2. Balance sheet account
  3. P&L statement account
  4. Finance and Controlling account

In SAP FICO, General ledger (G/L) accounts are master data that is used in day-to-day transaction processing in various modules of the SAP ERP system. Now, if you are required to create a G/L account centrally, then which of the following sequences of steps about the menu path are correct:

Steps

  1. SAP MENU
  2. Financial Accounting
  3. Accounting
  4. Master Records
  5. General Ledger
  6. Individual Processing
  7. GL Accounts
  8. FS00-Centrally

In SAP, Asset accounting is a sub-ledger to the SAP FI module for managing the Asset records. If you are working on the configuration of this module, then determine the transaction code for assigning Chart of Depreciation to Company Code in this scenario?

Bob is working on SAP FICO Accounts. If she is required to work on the steps for this account receivable configuration, then which of the following sequences of steps to perform this action in this scenario are correct:

Steps

  1. Creation of GL Reconciliation Accounts, creation of Customer master records, and document types and Number range ( DR, DZ, DA )
  2. Creation of Customer Account Group, create Number Ranges for Customer Accounts and assign Number range to Customer Accounts groups.
  3. Define tolerance group for the Customer.
  4. Bill of Exchange and Dunning

In SAP, Paul is working on General Ledger Accounting which is the complete record of all business transactions. He is working on the configuration steps for this Accounting. If he is required to define the Chart of Accounts, then determine its transaction code?

Bob is working on Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration from SAP Financial  Accounting. Now, if he is required to define a company in this procedure, then which of the following sequences of steps should he follow in this scenario:

  1. Implementation Guide for R/3 Customizing (IMG)
  2. Definition
  3. Define Company
  4. SPRO
  5. Enterprise Structure
  6. Financial Accounting

The SAP Financial Accounting enterprise structure is an organizational structure that represents an enterprise structure in SAP. Which of the following sequences of steps for Enterprise Structure Settings and configuration are correct:

  1. Define Business Area
  2. Define Credit Control Area
  3. Define Functional Area
  4. Define Company
  5. Define Company Code
  6. Assign Company Code to Company
  7. Assign Company Code to Credit Control Area
